column4: How do I get it so I don't have to re-enter my DNS settings every time I start Ubuntu
Because your router is giving you other dns servers? You can add a line to your /etc/dhcp3/dhclient.conf   with the following:  prepend domain-name-servers xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx xx.xxx.xx.xx;
